column4: I have a fresh install and my mouse is lagging like crazy. CPU/RAM usage is minimal and the system is very responsive but the mouse lag is bad. I can't seem to find anything useful in the forums or with google this time.
Could it just be miconfigured in preferences->mouse?
If I slide the speed up in mouse settings it just makes it unusable because it still lags so it looks like it teleports from one side to another :)
